name: my-movies
description: Designed and launched a user-centric movie information platform, integrating advanced filtering options for genre, year, reviews, and cast details; • Improved user satisfaction scores by 35% and boosted daily active users by 50% in six months • Utilized Redux Toolkit and RTK Query for state management, implemented CRUD operations for movies, integrated image uploads, and developed both backend (genres, movies) and frontend (user registration, movie details, comments section) functionalities to create a seamless user experience
author: ShreyaChavan
